message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that. Could you do $160?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
